package.name: Gir_suit
package.description: An Adium contactlist style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long: Author: "Images of Gir in his suit to go along with the Gir sounds and dock icon, neither of which I made." This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=6338
